params.poaId: The PoA submission ID to close

returns.totalAttestationsCount: Number of attestations by this verifier

params.poaId: The PoA submission ID to open for attestations

params._dvnConsensusContract: Address of the DVN consensus contract

params.isApproved: Whether the VA approves the submission
params.justificationURI: Optional IPFS hash with detailed justification

closeSubmissionForAttestation(bytes32).notice: Close a submission for attestations (called by consensus contract)

getApprovalCounts(bytes32).notice: Get approval count for a PoA submission

getAttestationByVerifier(bytes32,address.notice: Get attestation from a specific verifier for a PoA submission

getAttestationCount(bytes32).notice: Get attestation count for a PoA submission

getAttestations(bytes32).notice: Get all attestations for a specific PoA submission

getAttestorsByPoA(bytes32).notice: Get all attestors for a PoA submission

hasVerifierAttested(bytes32,address).notice: Check if a verifier has attested to a submission

openSubmissionForAttestation(bytes32).notice: Open a submission for attestations (called by consensus contract)

setDVNConsensusContract(address).notice: Set the DVN consensus contract address

submitAttestation(bytes32,bool,string).notice: Submit an attestation for a PoA submission

updateAttestation(bytes32,bool,string).notice: Update an existing attestation (before consensus is reached)

verifyAttestationSignature(bytes32,addre.notice: Verify attestation signature (placeholder for future implementation)
